actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that any individual who has 40 quarters of coverage, whenever acquired, will be insured for disability benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that any individual who has 40 quarters of coverage, whenever acquired, will be insured for disability benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that any individual who has 40 quarters of coverage, whenever acquired, will be insured for disability benefits thereunder.
